title: Weird sources of true damage on twisted treeline.
body:
There always seems to be some tiny amount of true damage dealt in my TT games by champions that should have no true dmg, just from my last game there's lucian, vlad and nautilus, Its not from smite either as they didn't have smite.
Anyone knows where it could be from?

replies.body:
There are a couple of other items that give (tiny amounts) true damage, not just smite. You can read about them [here](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/True_damage). 

Ignite also provides true damage, perhaps they were using it?
